message.content:
cs.CL, cs.IR, cs.LG, cs.AI, cs.SI

Reasoning: The paper deals with the problem of document similarity computation, which is a common task in natural language processing (NLP) and information retrieval (IR). The proposed framework, SimDoc, uses topic modeling and sequence alignment algorithms to estimate semantic similarity between documents. This makes it relevant to several sub-categories of computer science, including computational linguistics (cs.CL), information retrieval (cs.IR), machine learning (cs.LG), artificial intelligence (cs.AI), and social and information networks (cs.SI).
